element.name: DropDown
element.description: DropDown widget. Font, color, backgroundColor and cursor are inherited from the parent widget.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for DropDown widget.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for DropDown widget.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for DropDown widget.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for DropDown widget.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: padding
property.description: Defines the padding (i.e. the inner distance between border and content) for a DropDown item.

state.name: selected
state.description: Applies when DropDown item is selected.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over the DropDown item.
